dialogue.text: Woah! Okay, Third Eye travel still gives me the spins... BUT YO!
Babe, check this place! You seein' how this SICK neon pink light is like, BOUNCING off the... weird sticky walls? Kinda wild!
Babe? You zoning out on me? It's pretty rad, right? Makes everything look kinda... toxic chic?
Yes, PJ. I 'see' the aggressively pink, pulsing light bouncing off the questionable, likely flammable, decor... perfectly.
O-OH FUCK! RIGHT! THE SEEING THING! SHIT! MY BAD! BRAIN FART! HUGE ONE!
I TOTALLY BLANKED! AGAIN! GAH! SO SORRY BABE! I'M SUCH A DUMBASS!
Ah geez, I keep doing that... I'm really trying to remember, honest! Don't hate me!
Deep breaths, space cadet. Nobody hates you. It's... endearing. In a chaotic, occasionally frustrating way.
Now, you done having your meltdown? Let's just sing. Any more vivid descriptions from you and *I* might short-circuit.
Right! Yeah! Singing! Good plan! Wouldn't wanna fry your circuits, babe! Let's fuckin' do it!
